00028 btRigidBody& btActionInterface::getFixedBody()
00029 {
00030         static btRigidBody s_fixed(0, 0,0);
00031         s_fixed.setMassProps(btScalar(0.),btVector3(btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.)));
00032         return s_fixed;
00033 }

00035 btRaycastVehicle::btRaycastVehicle(const btVehicleTuning& tuning,btRigidBody* chassis,  btVehicleRaycaster* raycaster )
00036 :m_vehicleRaycaster(raycaster),
00037 m_pitchControl(btScalar(0.))
00038 {
00039         m_chassisBody = chassis;
00040         m_indexRightAxis = 0;
00041         m_indexUpAxis = 2;
00042         m_indexForwardAxis = 1;
00043         defaultInit(tuning);
00044 }

00065 btWheelInfo&    btRaycastVehicle::addWheel( const btVector3& connectionPointCS, const btVector3& wheelDirectionCS0,const btVector3& wheelAxleCS, btScalar suspensionRestLength, btScalar wheelRadius,const btVehicleTuning& tuning, bool isFrontWheel)
00066 {
00067 
00068         btWheelInfoConstructionInfo ci;
00069 
00070         ci.m_chassisConnectionCS = connectionPointCS;
00071         ci.m_wheelDirectionCS = wheelDirectionCS0;
00072         ci.m_wheelAxleCS = wheelAxleCS;
00073         ci.m_suspensionRestLength = suspensionRestLength;
00074         ci.m_wheelRadius = wheelRadius;
00075         ci.m_suspensionStiffness = tuning.m_suspensionStiffness;
00076         ci.m_wheelsDampingCompression = tuning.m_suspensionCompression;
00077         ci.m_wheelsDampingRelaxation = tuning.m_suspensionDamping;
00078         ci.m_frictionSlip = tuning.m_frictionSlip;
00079         ci.m_bIsFrontWheel = isFrontWheel;
00080         ci.m_maxSuspensionTravelCm = tuning.m_maxSuspensionTravelCm;
00081         ci.m_maxSuspensionForce = tuning.m_maxSuspensionForce;
00082 
00083         m_wheelInfo.push_back( btWheelInfo(ci));
00084         
00085         btWheelInfo& wheel = m_wheelInfo[getNumWheels()-1];
00086         
00087         updateWheelTransformsWS( wheel , false );
00088         updateWheelTransform(getNumWheels()-1,false);
00089         return wheel;
00090 }

00095 const btTransform&      btRaycastVehicle::getWheelTransformWS( int wheelIndex ) const
00096 {
00097         btAssert(wheelIndex < getNumWheels());
00098         const btWheelInfo& wheel = m_wheelInfo[wheelIndex];
00099         return wheel.m_worldTransform;
00100 
00101 }
00102 
00103 void    btRaycastVehicle::updateWheelTransform( int wheelIndex , bool interpolatedTransform)
00104 {
00105         
00106         btWheelInfo& wheel = m_wheelInfo[ wheelIndex ];
00107         updateWheelTransformsWS(wheel,interpolatedTransform);
00108         btVector3 up = -wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_wheelDirectionWS;
00109         const btVector3& right = wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_wheelAxleWS;
00110         btVector3 fwd = up.cross(right);
00111         fwd = fwd.normalize();
00112 //      up = right.cross(fwd);
00113 //      up.normalize();
00114 
00115         //rotate around steering over de wheelAxleWS
00116         btScalar steering = wheel.m_steering;
00117         
00118         btQuaternion steeringOrn(up,steering);//wheel.m_steering);
00119         btMatrix3x3 steeringMat(steeringOrn);
00120 
00121         btQuaternion rotatingOrn(right,-wheel.m_rotation);
00122         btMatrix3x3 rotatingMat(rotatingOrn);
00123 
00124         btMatrix3x3 basis2(
00125                 right[0],fwd[0],up[0],
00126                 right[1],fwd[1],up[1],
00127                 right[2],fwd[2],up[2]
00128         );
00129         
00130         wheel.m_worldTransform.setBasis(steeringMat * rotatingMat * basis2);
00131         wheel.m_worldTransform.setOrigin(
00132                 wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_hardPointWS + wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_wheelDirectionWS * wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_suspensionLength
00133         );
00134 }
00135 
00136 void btRaycastVehicle::resetSuspension()
00137 {
00138 
00139         int i;
00140         for (i=0;i<m_wheelInfo.size();  i++)
00141         {
00142                         btWheelInfo& wheel = m_wheelInfo[i];
00143                         wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_suspensionLength = wheel.getSuspensionRestLength();
00144                         wheel.m_suspensionRelativeVelocity = btScalar(0.0);
00145                         
00146                         wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactNormalWS = - wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_wheelDirectionWS;
00147                         //wheel_info.setContactFriction(btScalar(0.0));
00148                         wheel.m_clippedInvContactDotSuspension = btScalar(1.0);
00149         }
00150 }
00151 
00152 void    btRaycastVehicle::updateWheelTransformsWS(btWheelInfo& wheel , bool interpolatedTransform)
00153 {
00154         wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_isInContact = false;
00155 
00156         btTransform chassisTrans = getChassisWorldTransform();
00157         if (interpolatedTransform && (getRigidBody()->getMotionState()))
00158         {
00159                 getRigidBody()->getMotionState()->getWorldTransform(chassisTrans);
00160         }
00161 
00162         wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_hardPointWS = chassisTrans( wheel.m_chassisConnectionPointCS );
00163         wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_wheelDirectionWS = chassisTrans.getBasis() *  wheel.m_wheelDirectionCS ;
00164         wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_wheelAxleWS = chassisTrans.getBasis() * wheel.m_wheelAxleCS;
00165 }
00166 
00167 btScalar btRaycastVehicle::rayCast(btWheelInfo& wheel)
00168 {
00169         updateWheelTransformsWS( wheel,false);
00170 
00171         
00172         btScalar depth = -1;
00173         
00174         btScalar raylen = wheel.getSuspensionRestLength()+wheel.m_wheelsRadius;
00175 
00176         btVector3 rayvector = wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_wheelDirectionWS * (raylen);
00177         const btVector3& source = wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_hardPointWS;
00178         wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactPointWS = source + rayvector;
00179         const btVector3& target = wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactPointWS;
00180 
00181         btScalar param = btScalar(0.);
00182         
00183         btVehicleRaycaster::btVehicleRaycasterResult    rayResults;
00184 
00185         btAssert(m_vehicleRaycaster);
00186 
00187         void* object = m_vehicleRaycaster->castRay(source,target,rayResults);
00188 
00189         wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_groundObject = 0;
00190 
00191         if (object)
00192         {
00193                 param = rayResults.m_distFraction;
00194                 depth = raylen * rayResults.m_distFraction;
00195                 wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactNormalWS  = rayResults.m_hitNormalInWorld;
00196                 wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_isInContact = true;
00197                 
00198                 wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_groundObject = &getFixedBody();
00199                 //wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_groundObject = object;
00200 
00201 
00202                 btScalar hitDistance = param*raylen;
00203                 wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_suspensionLength = hitDistance - wheel.m_wheelsRadius;
00204                 //clamp on max suspension travel
00205 
00206                 btScalar  minSuspensionLength = wheel.getSuspensionRestLength() - wheel.m_maxSuspensionTravelCm*btScalar(0.01);
00207                 btScalar maxSuspensionLength = wheel.getSuspensionRestLength()+ wheel.m_maxSuspensionTravelCm*btScalar(0.01);
00208                 if (wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_suspensionLength < minSuspensionLength)
00209                 {
00210                         wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_suspensionLength = minSuspensionLength;
00211                 }
00212                 if (wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_suspensionLength > maxSuspensionLength)
00213                 {
00214                         wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_suspensionLength = maxSuspensionLength;
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactPointWS = rayResults.m_hitPointInWorld;
00218 
00219                 btScalar denominator= wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactNormalWS.dot( wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_wheelDirectionWS );
00220 
00221                 btVector3 chassis_velocity_at_contactPoint;
00222                 btVector3 relpos = wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactPointWS-getRigidBody()->getCenterOfMassPosition();
00223 
00224                 chassis_velocity_at_contactPoint = getRigidBody()->getVelocityInLocalPoint(relpos);
00225 
00226                 btScalar projVel = wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactNormalWS.dot( chassis_velocity_at_contactPoint );
00227 
00228                 if ( denominator >= btScalar(-0.1))
00229                 {
00230                         wheel.m_suspensionRelativeVelocity = btScalar(0.0);
00231                         wheel.m_clippedInvContactDotSuspension = btScalar(1.0) / btScalar(0.1);
00232                 }
00233                 else
00234                 {
00235                         btScalar inv = btScalar(-1.) / denominator;
00236                         wheel.m_suspensionRelativeVelocity = projVel * inv;
00237                         wheel.m_clippedInvContactDotSuspension = inv;
00238                 }
00239                         
00240         } else
00241         {
00242                 //put wheel info as in rest position
00243                 wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_suspensionLength = wheel.getSuspensionRestLength();
00244                 wheel.m_suspensionRelativeVelocity = btScalar(0.0);
00245                 wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactNormalWS = - wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_wheelDirectionWS;
00246                 wheel.m_clippedInvContactDotSuspension = btScalar(1.0);
00247         }
00248 
00249         return depth;
00250 }

00253 const btTransform& btRaycastVehicle::getChassisWorldTransform() const
00254 {
00255         /*if (getRigidBody()->getMotionState())
00256         {
00257                 btTransform chassisWorldTrans;
00258                 getRigidBody()->getMotionState()->getWorldTransform(chassisWorldTrans);
00259                 return chassisWorldTrans;
00260         }
00261         */
00262 
00263         
00264         return getRigidBody()->getCenterOfMassTransform();
00265 }

00267 
00268 void btRaycastVehicle::updateVehicle( btScalar step )
00269 {
00270         {
00271                 for (int i=0;i<getNumWheels();i++)
00272                 {
00273                         updateWheelTransform(i,false);
00274                 }
00275         }
00276 
00277 
00278         m_currentVehicleSpeedKmHour = btScalar(3.6) * getRigidBody()->getLinearVelocity().length();
00279         
00280         const btTransform& chassisTrans = getChassisWorldTransform();
00281 
00282         btVector3 forwardW (
00283                 chassisTrans.getBasis()[0][m_indexForwardAxis],
00284                 chassisTrans.getBasis()[1][m_indexForwardAxis],
00285                 chassisTrans.getBasis()[2][m_indexForwardAxis]);
00286 
00287         if (forwardW.dot(getRigidBody()->getLinearVelocity()) < btScalar(0.))
00288         {
00289                 m_currentVehicleSpeedKmHour *= btScalar(-1.);
00290         }
00291 
00292         //
00293         // simulate suspension
00294         //
00295         
00296         int i=0;
00297         for (i=0;i<m_wheelInfo.size();i++)
00298         {
00299                 //btScalar depth; 
00300                 //depth = 
00301                 rayCast( m_wheelInfo[i]);
00302         }
00303 
00304         updateSuspension(step);
00305 
00306         
00307         for (i=0;i<m_wheelInfo.size();i++)
00308         {
00309                 //apply suspension force
00310                 btWheelInfo& wheel = m_wheelInfo[i];
00311                 
00312                 btScalar suspensionForce = wheel.m_wheelsSuspensionForce;
00313                 
00314                 if (suspensionForce > wheel.m_maxSuspensionForce)
00315                 {
00316                         suspensionForce = wheel.m_maxSuspensionForce;
00317                 }
00318                 btVector3 impulse = wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactNormalWS * suspensionForce * step;
00319                 btVector3 relpos = wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactPointWS - getRigidBody()->getCenterOfMassPosition();
00320                 
00321                 getRigidBody()->applyImpulse(impulse, relpos);
00322         
00323         }
00324         
00325 
00326         
00327         updateFriction( step);
00328 
00329         
00330         for (i=0;i<m_wheelInfo.size();i++)
00331         {
00332                 btWheelInfo& wheel = m_wheelInfo[i];
00333                 btVector3 relpos = wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_hardPointWS - getRigidBody()->getCenterOfMassPosition();
00334                 btVector3 vel = getRigidBody()->getVelocityInLocalPoint( relpos );
00335 
00336                 if (wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_isInContact)
00337                 {
00338                         const btTransform&      chassisWorldTransform = getChassisWorldTransform();
00339 
00340                         btVector3 fwd (
00341                                 chassisWorldTransform.getBasis()[0][m_indexForwardAxis],
00342                                 chassisWorldTransform.getBasis()[1][m_indexForwardAxis],
00343                                 chassisWorldTransform.getBasis()[2][m_indexForwardAxis]);
00344 
00345                         btScalar proj = fwd.dot(wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactNormalWS);
00346                         fwd -= wheel.m_raycastInfo.m_contactNormalWS * proj;
00347 
00348                         btScalar proj2 = fwd.dot(vel);
00349                         
00350                         wheel.m_deltaRotation = (proj2 * step) / (wheel.m_wheelsRadius);
00351                         wheel.m_rotation += wheel.m_deltaRotation;
00352 
00353                 } else
00354                 {
00355                         wheel.m_rotation += wheel.m_deltaRotation;
00356                 }
00357                 
00358                 wheel.m_deltaRotation *= btScalar(0.99);//damping of rotation when not in contact
00359 
00360         }
00361 
00362 
00363 
00364 }

00410 
00411 
00412 void    btRaycastVehicle::updateSuspension(btScalar deltaTime)
00413 {
00414         (void)deltaTime;
00415 
00416         btScalar chassisMass = btScalar(1.) / m_chassisBody->getInvMass();
00417         
00418         for (int w_it=0; w_it<getNumWheels(); w_it++)
00419         {
00420                 btWheelInfo &wheel_info = m_wheelInfo[w_it];
00421                 
00422                 if ( wheel_info.m_raycastInfo.m_isInContact )
00423                 {
00424                         btScalar force;
00425                         //      Spring
00426                         {
00427                                 btScalar        susp_length                     = wheel_info.getSuspensionRestLength();
00428                                 btScalar        current_length = wheel_info.m_raycastInfo.m_suspensionLength;
00429 
00430                                 btScalar length_diff = (susp_length - current_length);
00431 
00432                                 force = wheel_info.m_suspensionStiffness
00433                                         * length_diff * wheel_info.m_clippedInvContactDotSuspension;
00434                         }
00435                 
00436                         // Damper
00437                         {
00438                                 btScalar projected_rel_vel = wheel_info.m_suspensionRelativeVelocity;
00439                                 {
00440                                         btScalar        susp_damping;
00441                                         if ( projected_rel_vel < btScalar(0.0) )
00442                                         {
00443                                                 susp_damping = wheel_info.m_wheelsDampingCompression;
00444                                         }
00445                                         else
00446                                         {
00447                                                 susp_damping = wheel_info.m_wheelsDampingRelaxation;
00448                                         }
00449                                         force -= susp_damping * projected_rel_vel;
00450                                 }
00451                         }
00452 
00453                         // RESULT
00454                         wheel_info.m_wheelsSuspensionForce = force * chassisMass;
00455                         if (wheel_info.m_wheelsSuspensionForce < btScalar(0.))
00456                         {
00457                                 wheel_info.m_wheelsSuspensionForce = btScalar(0.);
00458                         }
00459                 }
00460                 else
00461                 {
00462                         wheel_info.m_wheelsSuspensionForce = btScalar(0.0);
00463                 }
00464         }
00465 
00466 }

00468 
00469 struct btWheelContactPoint
00470 {
00471         btRigidBody* m_body0;
00472         btRigidBody* m_body1;
00473         btVector3       m_frictionPositionWorld;
00474         btVector3       m_frictionDirectionWorld;
00475         btScalar        m_jacDiagABInv;
00476         btScalar        m_maxImpulse;
00477 
00478 
00479         btWheelContactPoint(btRigidBody* body0,btRigidBody* body1,const btVector3& frictionPosWorld,const btVector3& frictionDirectionWorld, btScalar maxImpulse)
00480                 :m_body0(body0),
00481                 m_body1(body1),
00482                 m_frictionPositionWorld(frictionPosWorld),
00483                 m_frictionDirectionWorld(frictionDirectionWorld),
00484                 m_maxImpulse(maxImpulse)
00485         {
00486                 btScalar denom0 = body0->computeImpulseDenominator(frictionPosWorld,frictionDirectionWorld);
00487                 btScalar denom1 = body1->computeImpulseDenominator(frictionPosWorld,frictionDirectionWorld);
00488                 btScalar        relaxation = 1.f;
00489                 m_jacDiagABInv = relaxation/(denom0+denom1);
00490         }
00491 
00492 
00493 
00494 };
00495 
00496 btScalar calcRollingFriction(btWheelContactPoint& contactPoint);
00497 btScalar calcRollingFriction(btWheelContactPoint& contactPoint)
00498 {
00499 
00500         btScalar j1=0.f;
00501 
00502         const btVector3& contactPosWorld = contactPoint.m_frictionPositionWorld;
00503 
00504         btVector3 rel_pos1 = contactPosWorld - contactPoint.m_body0->getCenterOfMassPosition(); 
00505         btVector3 rel_pos2 = contactPosWorld - contactPoint.m_body1->getCenterOfMassPosition();
00506         
00507         btScalar maxImpulse  = contactPoint.m_maxImpulse;
00508         
00509         btVector3 vel1 = contactPoint.m_body0->getVelocityInLocalPoint(rel_pos1);
00510         btVector3 vel2 = contactPoint.m_body1->getVelocityInLocalPoint(rel_pos2);
00511         btVector3 vel = vel1 - vel2;
00512 
00513         btScalar vrel = contactPoint.m_frictionDirectionWorld.dot(vel);
00514 
00515         // calculate j that moves us to zero relative velocity
00516         j1 = -vrel * contactPoint.m_jacDiagABInv;
00517         btSetMin(j1, maxImpulse);
00518         btSetMax(j1, -maxImpulse);
00519 
00520         return j1;
00521 }
00522

00524 
00525 
00526 btScalar sideFrictionStiffness2 = btScalar(1.0);
00527 void    btRaycastVehicle::updateFriction(btScalar       timeStep)
00528 {
00529 
00530                 //calculate the impulse, so that the wheels don't move sidewards
00531                 int numWheel = getNumWheels();
00532                 if (!numWheel)
00533                         return;
00534 
00535                 m_forwardWS.resize(numWheel);
00536                 m_axle.resize(numWheel);
00537                 m_forwardImpulse.resize(numWheel);
00538                 m_sideImpulse.resize(numWheel);
00539                 
00540                 int numWheelsOnGround = 0;
00541         
00542 
00543                 //collapse all those loops into one!
00544                 for (int i=0;i<getNumWheels();i++)
00545                 {
00546                         btWheelInfo& wheelInfo = m_wheelInfo[i];
00547                         class btRigidBody* groundObject = (class btRigidBody*) wheelInfo.m_raycastInfo.m_groundObject;
00548                         if (groundObject)
00549                                 numWheelsOnGround++;
00550                         m_sideImpulse[i] = btScalar(0.);
00551                         m_forwardImpulse[i] = btScalar(0.);
00552 
00553                 }
00554         
00555                 {
00556         
00557                         for (int i=0;i<getNumWheels();i++)
00558                         {
00559 
00560                                 btWheelInfo& wheelInfo = m_wheelInfo[i];
00561                                         
00562                                 class btRigidBody* groundObject = (class btRigidBody*) wheelInfo.m_raycastInfo.m_groundObject;
00563 
00564                                 if (groundObject)
00565                                 {
00566 
00567                                         const btTransform& wheelTrans = getWheelTransformWS( i );
00568 
00569                                         btMatrix3x3 wheelBasis0 = wheelTrans.getBasis();
00570                                         m_axle[i] = btVector3(  
00571                                                 wheelBasis0[0][m_indexRightAxis],
00572                                                 wheelBasis0[1][m_indexRightAxis],
00573                                                 wheelBasis0[2][m_indexRightAxis]);
00574                                         
00575                                         const btVector3& surfNormalWS = wheelInfo.m_raycastInfo.m_contactNormalWS;
00576                                         btScalar proj = m_axle[i].dot(surfNormalWS);
00577                                         m_axle[i] -= surfNormalWS * proj;
00578                                         m_axle[i] = m_axle[i].normalize();
00579                                         
00580                                         m_forwardWS[i] = surfNormalWS.cross(m_axle[i]);
00581                                         m_forwardWS[i].normalize();
00582 
00583                                 
00584                                         resolveSingleBilateral(*m_chassisBody, wheelInfo.m_raycastInfo.m_contactPointWS,
00585                                                           *groundObject, wheelInfo.m_raycastInfo.m_contactPointWS,
00586                                                           btScalar(0.), m_axle[i],m_sideImpulse[i],timeStep);
00587 
00588                                         m_sideImpulse[i] *= sideFrictionStiffness2;
00589                                                 
00590                                 }
00591                                 
00592 
00593                         }
00594                 }
00595 
00596         btScalar sideFactor = btScalar(1.);
00597         btScalar fwdFactor = 0.5;
00598 
00599         bool sliding = false;
00600         {
00601                 for (int wheel =0;wheel <getNumWheels();wheel++)
00602                 {
00603                         btWheelInfo& wheelInfo = m_wheelInfo[wheel];
00604                         class btRigidBody* groundObject = (class btRigidBody*) wheelInfo.m_raycastInfo.m_groundObject;
00605 
00606                         btScalar        rollingFriction = 0.f;
00607 
00608                         if (groundObject)
00609                         {
00610                                 if (wheelInfo.m_engineForce != 0.f)
00611                                 {
00612                                         rollingFriction = wheelInfo.m_engineForce* timeStep;
00613                                 } else
00614                                 {
00615                                         btScalar defaultRollingFrictionImpulse = 0.f;
00616                                         btScalar maxImpulse = wheelInfo.m_brake ? wheelInfo.m_brake : defaultRollingFrictionImpulse;
00617                                         btWheelContactPoint contactPt(m_chassisBody,groundObject,wheelInfo.m_raycastInfo.m_contactPointWS,m_forwardWS[wheel],maxImpulse);
00618                                         rollingFriction = calcRollingFriction(contactPt);
00619                                 }
00620                         }
00621 
00622                         //switch between active rolling (throttle), braking and non-active rolling friction (no throttle/break)
00623                         
00624 
00625 
00626 
00627                         m_forwardImpulse[wheel] = btScalar(0.);
00628                         m_wheelInfo[wheel].m_skidInfo= btScalar(1.);
00629 
00630                         if (groundObject)
00631                         {
00632                                 m_wheelInfo[wheel].m_skidInfo= btScalar(1.);
00633                                 
00634                                 btScalar maximp = wheelInfo.m_wheelsSuspensionForce * timeStep * wheelInfo.m_frictionSlip;
00635                                 btScalar maximpSide = maximp;
00636 
00637                                 btScalar maximpSquared = maximp * maximpSide;
00638                         
00639 
00640                                 m_forwardImpulse[wheel] = rollingFriction;//wheelInfo.m_engineForce* timeStep;
00641 
00642                                 btScalar x = (m_forwardImpulse[wheel] ) * fwdFactor;
00643                                 btScalar y = (m_sideImpulse[wheel] ) * sideFactor;
00644                                 
00645                                 btScalar impulseSquared = (x*x + y*y);
00646 
00647                                 if (impulseSquared > maximpSquared)
00648                                 {
00649                                         sliding = true;
00650                                         
00651                                         btScalar factor = maximp / btSqrt(impulseSquared);
00652                                         
00653                                         m_wheelInfo[wheel].m_skidInfo *= factor;
00654                                 }
00655                         } 
00656 
00657                 }
00658         }
00659 
00660         
00661 
00662 
00663                 if (sliding)
00664                 {
00665                         for (int wheel = 0;wheel < getNumWheels(); wheel++)
00666                         {
00667                                 if (m_sideImpulse[wheel] != btScalar(0.))
00668                                 {
00669                                         if (m_wheelInfo[wheel].m_skidInfo< btScalar(1.))
00670                                         {
00671                                                 m_forwardImpulse[wheel] *=      m_wheelInfo[wheel].m_skidInfo;
00672                                                 m_sideImpulse[wheel] *= m_wheelInfo[wheel].m_skidInfo;
00673                                         }
00674                                 }
00675                         }
00676                 }
00677 
00678                 // apply the impulses
00679                 {
00680                         for (int wheel = 0;wheel<getNumWheels() ; wheel++)
00681                         {
00682                                 btWheelInfo& wheelInfo = m_wheelInfo[wheel];
00683 
00684                                 btVector3 rel_pos = wheelInfo.m_raycastInfo.m_contactPointWS - 
00685                                                 m_chassisBody->getCenterOfMassPosition();
00686 
00687                                 if (m_forwardImpulse[wheel] != btScalar(0.))
00688                                 {
00689                                         m_chassisBody->applyImpulse(m_forwardWS[wheel]*(m_forwardImpulse[wheel]),rel_pos);
00690                                 }
00691                                 if (m_sideImpulse[wheel] != btScalar(0.))
00692                                 {
00693                                         class btRigidBody* groundObject = (class btRigidBody*) m_wheelInfo[wheel].m_raycastInfo.m_groundObject;
00694 
00695                                         btVector3 rel_pos2 = wheelInfo.m_raycastInfo.m_contactPointWS - 
00696                                                 groundObject->getCenterOfMassPosition();
00697 
00698                                         
00699                                         btVector3 sideImp = m_axle[wheel] * m_sideImpulse[wheel];
00700 
00701 #if defined ROLLING_INFLUENCE_FIX // fix. It only worked if car's up was along Y - VT.
00702                                         btVector3 vChassisWorldUp = getRigidBody()->getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().getColumn(m_indexUpAxis);
00703                                         rel_pos -= vChassisWorldUp * (vChassisWorldUp.dot(rel_pos) * (1.f-wheelInfo.m_rollInfluence));
00704 #else
00705                                         rel_pos[m_indexUpAxis] *= wheelInfo.m_rollInfluence;
00706 #endif
00707                                         m_chassisBody->applyImpulse(sideImp,rel_pos);
00708 
00709                                         //apply friction impulse on the ground
00710                                         groundObject->applyImpulse(-sideImp,rel_pos2);
00711                                 }
00712                         }
00713                 }
00714 
00715         
00716 }
00717 
00718 
00719 
00720 void    btRaycastVehicle::debugDraw(btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer)
00721 {
00722 
00723         for (int v=0;v<this->getNumWheels();v++)
00724         {
00725                 btVector3 wheelColor(0,1,1);
00726                 if (getWheelInfo(v).m_raycastInfo.m_isInContact)
00727                 {
00728                         wheelColor.setValue(0,0,1);
00729                 } else
00730                 {
00731                         wheelColor.setValue(1,0,1);
00732                 }
00733 
00734                 btVector3 wheelPosWS = getWheelInfo(v).m_worldTransform.getOrigin();
00735 
00736                 btVector3 axle = btVector3(     
00737                         getWheelInfo(v).m_worldTransform.getBasis()[0][getRightAxis()],
00738                         getWheelInfo(v).m_worldTransform.getBasis()[1][getRightAxis()],
00739                         getWheelInfo(v).m_worldTransform.getBasis()[2][getRightAxis()]);
00740 
00741                 //debug wheels (cylinders)
00742                 debugDrawer->drawLine(wheelPosWS,wheelPosWS+axle,wheelColor);
00743                 debugDrawer->drawLine(wheelPosWS,getWheelInfo(v).m_raycastInfo.m_contactPointWS,wheelColor);
00744 
00745         }
00746 }
00747 
00748 
00749 void* btDefaultVehicleRaycaster::castRay(const btVector3& from,const btVector3& to, btVehicleRaycasterResult& result)
00750 {
00751 //      RayResultCallback& resultCallback;
00752 
00753         btCollisionWorld::ClosestRayResultCallback rayCallback(from,to);
00754 
00755         m_dynamicsWorld->rayTest(from, to, rayCallback);
00756 
00757         if (rayCallback.hasHit())
00758         {
00759                 
00760                 const btRigidBody* body = btRigidBody::upcast(rayCallback.m_collisionObject);
00761         if (body && body->hasContactResponse())
00762                 {
00763                         result.m_hitPointInWorld = rayCallback.m_hitPointWorld;
00764                         result.m_hitNormalInWorld = rayCallback.m_hitNormalWorld;
00765                         result.m_hitNormalInWorld.normalize();
00766                         result.m_distFraction = rayCallback.m_closestHitFraction;
00767                         return (void*)body;
00768                 }
00769         }
00770         return 0;
00771 }
